mapper.select: select id, company, pqr_no, pqr_date, wps_no, wps_rev_no, welding_process1, welding_process2, welding_process3, welding_type1, welding_type2, welding_type3, origin_file_name, other, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user from pqr_info where company=#{company} AND pqr_no=#{pqrNo}
mapper.insert: insert into pqr_info ( company, pqr_no, pqr_date, wps_no, wps_rev_no, welding_process1, welding_process2, welding_process3, welding_type1, welding_type2, welding_type3, origin_file_name, other, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user ) values ( #{company}, #{pqrNo}, #{pqrDate}, #{wpsNo}, #{wpsRevNo}, #{weldingProcess1}, #{weldingProcess2}, #{weldingProcess3}, #{weldingType1}, #{weldingType2}, #{weldingType3}, #{originFileName}, #{other}, NOW(), 0, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: select IF(COUNT(*) = 1,1,0) from pqr_info where company=#{company} AND pqr_no=#{pqrNo}
